definition: (old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]

sentences.english: Is that why I appear to be in downtown Fallujah behind the wheel of an up-armored Humvee?
sentences.chinese: 所以我在費盧傑市區，跟在一輛全副武裝的悍馬後面？

sentences.english: The Marines had planned to slip into Fallujah "as soft as fog."
sentences.chinese: 海軍陸戰隊曾計劃潛入費盧傑“像霧軟。”

sentences.english: What happened in Fallujah was an act of barbarity.
sentences.chinese: 發生在費盧傑的是野蠻行爲。
